# [Interview #1151: Calamity-Austin, Entry #13](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1151#13)

#### Question

How many words do you think you average a day?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I average about 2,000.

#### Question

[Laughing] That's actually a goal I could hit!

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yeah, not too many - I'm just incredibly consistent.

#### Tags

Brandon on writing
